name: Druid Hut
description: A locale steeped in arcane or spiritual power; adventurers may study spells, brew potions, or face eldritch hazards.
atmosphere: The hut is filled with the rich scent of herbs, earth, and the subtle tang of natural magic. The air carries the weight of ancient wisdom and the power of nature, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of the natural world and the mysteries of druidic magic.
